comment.author: 77541634@N00
comment._content: Is the guy on the left not on a surfboard? The board looks bigger & he's holding a paddle?

comment.realname: lifeasdaddy ...a guy, his wife, and their son...
comment.author: 13267298@N00
comment._content:
I agree with Paul Hagon, looks like a kind of early surf ski, rather than a surf board being used by the bloke at left.

On the other hand, I guess if he's standing up on it and riding a wave, then it's probably surfing!
